channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mistral releases Voxtral, its first open source AI audio model
item.description: French startup Mistral has jumped into the audio race with Voxtral, its first open model, aiming to challenge the dominance of walled-off corporate sy...

item.title: Do You Need a Box Spring for Your Modern-Day Mattress? (2025)
item.description: If you haven’t seen a box spring in a while, it’s not your imagination—a mattress expert breaks down when you might need this dinosaur of the sleep wo...

item.title: Reddit rolls out age verification in the UK to comply with new rules
item.description: Reddit users in the UK will have to upload their ID or a selfie to access potentially harmful content.

item.title: Uber’s latest robotaxi partner is China’s Baidu
item.description: Baidu is the latest addition to Uber's growing list of autonomous vehicle partners, which includes Waymo, Volkswagen, May Mobility, and Pony AI.

item.title: This Guy Attached 21 Chef’s Knives to a Slicing Robot Arm to Determine Which One Is Best
item.description: Certified kitchen knife nerd Scott Heimendinger used a robot arm on multiple chef’s knives to collect 100,000 data points about which blades cut most ...

item.title: 6 Best Android Tablets (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Forget the iPad. Catch up on your favorite shows in bed with one of these Android-powered slates.

item.title: Our Favorite Bottle Washers for Keeping Your Baby Bottles Safe and Clean (2025)
item.description: Keeping baby bottles clean and sterilized is a chore. We tested automatic bottle washers to see if they're worth buying.

item.title: A comprehensive list of 2025 tech layoffs
item.description: A complete list of all the known layoffs in tech, from Big Tech to startups, broken down by month throughout 2024.

item.title: Best Yoga Mat (2025), Tested and Reviewed

item.title: Rivian taps Google to bring custom maps into its EVs and app
item.description: Rivian vehicles will soon replace its Mapbox-based maps with Google Maps. The integration will still see a lot of Rivian DNA in the new mapping system...
